job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <strong><u>Duties<br><br></u></strong><strong>Job Description:<br></strong><ul><li>You will join the department of AI/Client within Research Biology.</li><li>You will collaborate with scientists working on different areas of machine learning and the life sciences.</li><li>You will closely collaborate with machine learning scientists, computational chemists and bioinformaticians across departments in the organization.</li><li>You will develop and deploy deep learning methods for representation learning of small molecules and prediction of chemical properties.</li><li>The work will also involve software development, infrastructure and hardware optimizations, data pipelining, and innovations to implement robust AI solutions for real world use cases.<br></li></ul><strong><u>Skills<br></u></strong><ul><li>Demonstrated experience with deep learning frameworks and models (PyTorch is preferred).</li><li>Proficient in Python.</li><li>Demonstrated experience in software development, GPU acceleration, model optimization and scaling for multiple server nodes.</li><li>Excellent communication and collaboration skills.<br></li></ul><strong><u>Education<br></u></strong><ul><li>MSc or PhD degree in a quantitative field (e.g. Computer Science, Computational Chemistry, Machine Learning, Statistics, Mathematics, Physics).</li><li>Industry experience as data scientist or Client engineer in a healthcare company.</li><li>Experience in deep learning for graph-based and/or sequence-based data.</li><li>Experience in deep learning for small molecules.</li></ul>
